item.title: Shell Island Snorkel and Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time
item.description: Cruise to Shell Island and search for wild dolphins on a catamaran sailing trip from Panama City Beach. The catamaran’s broad, stable deck makes it a comfortable alternative to smaller boats prone to rocking in the waves, and since it’s stocked with paddle boards, snorkeling gear, and a waterslide, it’s the perfect base for playing in the clear water off Shell Island.

image.alt: Shell Island Snorkel and Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time

item.title: Sunset & Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time
item.description: Watch dolphins frolic through coastal waters on this scenic 2-hour sunset sail. Board your comfortable catamaran, and listen to music. Cruise through Grand Lagoon, passing elegant homes and St. Andrews State Park. See pods of dolphins travel together and leap above the water. Take photos and admire incredible sunset views. Don’t miss the chance to participate in games and dance when the boat docks.

image.alt: Sunset & Dolphin Catamaran Cruise with Island Time

item.title: Cypress Springs Eco Adventure
item.description: Journey to Cypress Springs on this water adventure tour, and see one of Florida’s lesser-known beautiful springs. Head down Holmes Creek in a canoe, kayak, or paddleboard to make your way to Cypress Springs. Once there, enjoy ample time to snorkel, swim, or relax, and enjoy a sandwich lunch when hunger strikes.

image.alt: Cypress Springs Eco Adventure

item.title: Wreck and Bridge Span Dive for Certified Divers
item.description: When diving in Panama City Beach, there’s more see than just fish. This trip for open water-certified divers lets you explore a shipwreck in addition to seeing fish like snapper and bait fish. No equipment is included, so divers who bring their own can save majorly, while those who need to rent can add equipment at an additional fee.

image.alt: Wreck and Bridge Span Dive for Certified Divers

item.title: AXE Throwing
item.description: Discover a new activity during your time in Panama City Beach with this exciting ax-throwing experience. Grab your friends and a few axes and learn to hurl them at targets in a safe environment. Whether you're in a small group or looking to take your company out for a fun activity, there is something for everyone at AXE Throwing PCB.

image.alt: AXE Throwing

item.title: Scream Machine Thrill Ride at Panama City Beach
item.description: Zip across the water, let loose, and even let out a shriek or two when you ride the Scream Machine: a twin-engine jet boat whose speed, 360-degree turns, and nose dives make it feel more like a rollercoaster on water. Pick from multiple departure times, head to the dock, and strap in: you can soak up the sun (and get splashed by the surf) as you speed past Panama City Beach.

image.alt: Scream Machine Thrill Ride at Panama City Beach

item.title: Area Z51-Zombie Escape
item.description: If you love challenges that exercise your mind and your teamwork skills you'll enjoy this zombie-themed escape room. Grab a group of friends and get ready to race against the clock solving puzzles, role playing, and uncovering clues. Your fate is in your own hands, so sign up for the challenge of a lifetime and see if you have what it takes to get out before the zombies get in.

image.alt: Area Z51-Zombie Escape

item.title: Two Hour Sightseeing/Dolphin Tour in Panama City Beach
item.description: Get a chance to spot dolphin pods during this comfortable, nature-filled boat tour along St. Andrews Bay and into Gulf of Mexico, led by a local captain. Listen to insider commentary as you cruise the picturesque waters of the Florida coastline, departing from Panama City. Snorkeling equipment is included, and you’ll also enjoy a stroll down pristine Shell Island.

image.alt: Two Hour Sightseeing/Dolphin Tour in Panama City Beach

item.title: Swim with the Dolphins Boat Tour in Panama City Beach
item.description: Observe Panama City Beach’s population of Atlantic Bottlenose Dolphins up close—and even swim nearby—with this dolphin-spotting boat tour. Set off with an expert local skipper to increase your chances of catching sight of these fascinating marine mammals, and dive into the waves to swim and snorkel in their habitat (weather permitting). Afterwards, make a stop on Shell Island to relax and collect colorful shells before heading back to port.

image.alt: Swim with the Dolphins Boat Tour in Panama City Beach

item.title: Panama City Scuba Diving Activity for Beginners
item.description: If you wish to try scuba diving and you have never been underwater before, our Try Diving Activity tour is your best fit. COMPLIMENTARY GoPro videos and photos with your best moments. No swimming skills or previous experience is reqired. Dive into local marine environment and practice fundamental skills of scuba diving, in the comfort of your group of friends or family and a professional PADI Instructor. This is the very first step in discovering underwater world. All necessary equipment is included.

image.alt: Panama City Scuba Diving Activity for Beginners

item.title: Panama City Beach Dolphin Sightseeing Sail
item.description:
This cruise along the Gulf Coastline and Bay area offers a great opportunity to photograph local wildlife and scenery. At our onboard bar we have snacks and beverages available for purchase. Enjoy a variety of cocktails, including our signature Privateer Punch! Please note our bar accepts debit/credit card transactions only.
As you cruise around the Gulf and Bay areas, you'll have the best chances of finding dolphins, and there's no better place to be than on the water in beautiful Panama City Beach.

image.alt: Panama City Beach Dolphin Sightseeing Sail

item.title: Sunset Cruise 1.5 Hour Lower Grand Lagoon
item.description: Party on the sea under the sunset in this unique, tiki bar-inspired vessel. You and your captain will set sail for stunning views as you put a playlist on and party. There’s an ice cooler for whatever drinks you choose to bring on this unforgettable charter—all you need to do is have fun and make sure you drink responsibly.

image.alt: Sunset Cruise 1.5 Hour Lower Grand Lagoon

item.title: Fear at the Pier Haunted Attraction
item.description:
Looking for a panic room near you to feel primal fear? Feel the goosebumps in an old abandoned haunted building – visit our “Fear at the Pier Haunted House” attraction.
You must demonstrate your ingenuity to unravel the scary mysteries and escape this hellish place. Don’t let yourself fall into despair before the evil ghosts and other creatures from the other world take possession of you and leave you here forever!

image.alt: Fear at the Pier Haunted Attraction

item.title: Self-Guided E-Bike or Cruiser Bike Tour of St. Andrews State Park
item.description: Panama City Beach is a fantastic destination that even Florida locals visit for vacation. No matter if it’s your first visit or if you’ve already seen PCB’s beaches and bars, this self-guided bike tour is a great way to escape the crowds and see a different side of the area. The tour takes you across more than 8 miles (13km) of the Lower Grand Lagoon neighborhood where you’ll find the local-side of Panama City Beach.

image.alt: Self-Guided E-Bike or Cruiser Bike Tour of St. Andrews State Park

item.title: Jet Ski Adventure Tour
item.description: Hop aboard for a thrilling jet ski safari around St Andrew’s Bay. Zip along the coast on your own Jet Ski or ride with friends, and look out for dolphins, sea turtles, and manatees in the clear Gulf of Mexico waters. Along the way, stop at Shell Island, where you can swim, explore the island, or hire snorkel equipment.

image.alt: Jet Ski Adventure Tour

item.title: Snorkeling, Dolphin and Wildlife Sightings at St. Andrews Bay
item.description: Skip the predictable itinerary of a group tour and set off instead on board a private boat to spot dolphins and other marine wildlife in St. Andrews Bay at your own pace. This customized tour will take you to the best wildlife-spotting sights to marvel at dolphins, seabirds, and even deer along the coast. Slip on a snorkeling mask to get a closer look or relax on board and learn more about the local fauna from your expert skipper.

image.alt: Snorkeling, Dolphin and Wildlife Sightings at St. Andrews Bay

item.title: Outer Space One Hour Escape Game
item.description: Grab a group of friends and prepare to put your thinking caps on for an hour of challenging fun. This outer space-themed escape room will require you to work together, pool your problem-solving skills, and race against the clock to crack the codes to complete a successful mission. See if you have what it takes to escape from outer space.

image.alt: Outer Space One Hour Escape Game

item.title: 2 Hour Private Dolphin and Sightseeing Tour in Shell Island
item.description: The underdeveloped beauty of Shell Island allows you to explore the Gulf’s natural beauty while being only minutes away from Panama City’s crowded streets. This relaxing cruise takes you on a sightseeing tour of Shell Island. Glide around St. Andrews Bay, looking out for dolphins that might swim by your boat. Finally, you’ll sail deeper into the Gulf and marvel at the sunset over the water before heading back to shore.

image.alt: 2 Hour Private Dolphin and Sightseeing Tour in Shell Island

item.title: The Forbidden Tomb Escape Game
item.description: Put your problem-solving skills to the test during this team-building escape game experience. You and your group will be locked in a 'Forbidden Tomb' room for one hour, during which time you'll have to sole a variety of puzzles and riddles in order to figure out how to escape. Once you're done, you'll have a bit of free time for photos and debriefing.

image.alt: The Forbidden Tomb Escape Game

item.title: Scuba Certification
item.description: Learn how to scuba dive with this certification in Panama City Beach. Gain new skills over a three-day training that takes place in a pool, from shore, and offshore from a boat. Build up your scuba knowledge and learn to safely dive to a depth of sixty feet. The certification is valid for life and all necessary equipment is provided.

image.alt: Scuba Certification

item.title: The Terminal Escape Room of Florida
item.description: Participate in a group activity during this escape room experience in Panama City Beach. Jump into a New York subway terminal that has suffered from a system failure. It’s up to you and your group to restore power and stop a careening train from crashing into the next terminal. Use quick thinking and teamwork to solve a series of puzzles and challenges in just one hour.

image.alt: The Terminal Escape Room of Florida

item.title: 3 Hour Dolphin Tour and Snorkeling in Shell Island
item.description: Seeing dolphins in the wild is a dream for many travelers. Join a former marine mammal trainer, who has deep expertise, on this private tour that gets you up close and personal with these wonderful creatures and helps you understand their behaviors. You’ll also explore Shell Island and snorkel for sand dollars and starfish (equipment included). Feel free to bring your own drinks on the boat.

image.alt: 3 Hour Dolphin Tour and Snorkeling in Shell Island

item.title: 2 Hour Private Dolphin Sightseeing Tour
item.description: Panama City Beach is a gem on the Gulf of Mexico, so much so that even marine life can’t resist hanging out on its sandy shoreline. Get out into the water and watch the playful dolphins swim by during this private boating tour. You and your group will join the captain for a relaxed ride in the Gulf’s emerald waters and the serene St. Andrews Bay. Sail around looking for dolphins, taking photos, and enjoying the Florida sunshine.

image.alt: 2 Hour Private Dolphin Sightseeing Tour

item.title: Small Group Guided Shore Dives in St. Andrews State Park, Florida
item.description: The wildlife at the State park is unpredictable with groupers, snappers and angel fish guaranteed and everything from dolphins, eagle rays, to manatees possible but less common. If you have good eyes or a passion for macro photography, octopus, scorpion fish, frogfish, and sea horses are present, if you can find them, in addition to the many species of blenny, crabs, mollusks, and fish. Visibility is generally 15-30'. Mild currents are normal as well.

image.alt: Small Group Guided Shore Dives in St. Andrews State Park, Florida
